verbs.description: [ARG0: religious leaders] to [V: hold] [ARG1: interfaith gathering] [ARGM-LOC: in nyc] [ARGM-TMP: in wake of synagogue shooting] gov andrew cuomo ordered flags on state government buildings in n the wake of a mass shooting at a pittsburgh synagogue while leaders planned an interfaith gathering in new york city temple emanu - el squirrel hill bill de blasio mayor bill de blasio pittsburgh new york city wake of synagogue ny tree of life synagogue cardinal timothy dolan nyc congregation emanu el of new york upper east side synagogue timothy m dolan
